Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Map is for generating the whole map of the level from Resource.
    Author:
    kevingok

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(java.lang.String mapName, double tileSize)
      Class constructor triggering loadMap and loadTile methods to generate complete map object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[][] getMap()
      Get map array.
      double getTileSize()
      Get size of each tile.
      int getTileType(int row, int col)
      Get type of tile.
      double getX()
      Get position of current position of map.
      void loadMap(java.lang.String mapName)
      Load the map index file from Resource folder and store total number of column and row of indices into 2D array.
      void loadTiles()
      Load the map image file from Resource folder.
      void render(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Draw map from tile image.
      void setPosition(double x)
      Set position of x for moving map onwards.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(java.lang.String mapName,
           double tileSize)
        Class constructor triggering loadMap and loadTile methods to generate complete map object.
        Parameters:
        mapName - Sets filename of map
        tileSize - Sets size of the tile

    • Method Detail

      • loadMap

        public void loadMap(java.lang.String mapName)
        Load the map index file from Resource folder and store total number of column and row of indices into 2D array.
        Parameters:
        mapName - Sets filename of map

      • loadTiles

        public void loadTiles()
        Load the map image file from Resource folder. Method will define whether each tile is a block or able to be passed through

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(double x)
        Set position of x for moving map onwards.
        Parameters:
        x - Sets position of map image

      • getX

        public double getX()
        Get position of current position of map.
        Returns:
        Position of map

      • getTileSize

        public double getTileSize()
        Get size of each tile.
        Returns:
        size of tile

      • getTileType

        public int getTileType(int row,
                       int col)
        Get type of tile.
        Parameters:
        row - Total row number of map indices
        col - Total column number of map indices
        Returns:
        type integer

      • getMap

        public int[][] getMap()
        Get map array.
        Returns:
        2D array of map

      • render

        public void render(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
        Draw map from tile image.
        Parameters:
        gc - Image of entire tile
